sentences.en: A ray of sunlight slanting through a window fell on dusty table - tops.
sentences.cn: 一道阳光从窗口斜照进来,照在积了灰尘的桌面上有些发黄.

sentences.en: Adrian cycled along the dusty road.
sentences.cn: 阿德里安沿着满是尘土的路骑自行车。

sentences.en: He spent his weekends poking around dusty old bookshops.
sentences.cn: 他周末都泡在布满尘埃的旧书店里.

sentences.en: He was pulling dead roots from the dusty earth.
sentences.cn: 他正在从土中拔出枯死的根茎.

sentences.en: His black cassock was dusty and sweat - stained.
sentences.cn: 他黑色的袍子上尽是尘土,汗渍斑斑.

sentences.en: His black hat was the brown color of the earth and his clothes were dusty and torn.
sentences.cn: 他的黑帽成了土褐色,衣服也又脏又破.

sentences.en: It's very windy and dusty here in winter.
Meanwhile, Dusty Springfield's new TV series began a run on BBC 1.
sentences.cn: 同时，达斯蒂·斯普林菲尔德的电视剧新作开始在BBC1台播放。

sentences.en: One spring it was very windy and dusty here.
sentences.cn: 有一年春天这里风沙很大.
一摞一摞布满灰尘的书

sentences.en: Scarlett burrowed her head in the dusty upholstery and screamed again.
sentences.cn: 思嘉趴在满是尘土的软垫上,又大喊起来.

sentences.en: She had matted hair and torn dusty clothes.
sentences.cn: 她蓬头乱发，衣衫褴褛，满是灰尘。

sentences.en: The books looked faded, dusty and unused.
sentences.cn: 那些书看上去褪了色，尘封已久。

sentences.en: The car pulled up too fast and skidded on the dusty shoulder of the road.
sentences.cn: 由于刹车太急，车子侧滑到了满是尘土的路肩上。

sentences.en: They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.
sentences.cn: 在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。

sentences.en: Thick cobwebs hung in the dusty corners.
sentences.cn: 积有灰尘的角落挂着厚厚的蜘蛛网。

words.tran_cn: 抹布，掸子；除尘器；打扫灰尘的人

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式，旧)（人的健康或境况）还不错
